Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory709.jpg'}
{3: 'The night up on the snowy mountain is brighter than you thought.'}
{3: 'Piercing through the thin clouds, the moonlight falls onto the ground and reflects off the snow, illuminating its surroundings.'}
{3: "When you've climbed over the stacked rocks and through the dense forests and arrived at the summit, the view before you suddenly clears up."}
{3: 'The steep terrain levels out, and with no obstacles blocking your view, deep tranquility fills you as you gaze into the distance.'}
{3: 'You see this sense of accomplishment as a reward for having made it all the way to the top, and you feel great about it.'}

{3: 'A red motorcycle is parked in the middle, next to a burning campfire. Sitting by the campfire, Alpha is adding wood to it. A white long-haired cat curls up on her lap as it tries to adjust its posture to the direction of the flames.'}
{3: "Alpha pokes the fire a couple of times. The flickering light illuminates her profile. You know that she's noticed you, but she doesn't bother to turn her head around to face you."}
{2: 'α', 3: "You've got a real nerve coming here. Never crossed your mind this might be some sort of Ascendant trick, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because I trust you.', 3: '14', 4: "And I guess it didn't cross your mind that this might be a sting operation by Babylonia?", 5: '15'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'So you trust an enemy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "If it really were a Babylonia operation, I'd be the last one to suffer.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seems like Alpha and her less-than-friendly greetings never get old...'}
{2: 'How about trying a normal greeting next time, like "hello"?', 3: '20', 4: '(Walk directly to the fire and sit down)', 5: '22'}
{3: "Silence... but it doesn't really matter. It was meant as a casual remark, and it's not like you really expect her to change anyway..."}
{3: 'Noticing a few rocks half-covered in snow near the fire, you walk over and sit down on one not too far from Alpha.'}
{3: 'Alpha neither welcomes nor rejects my approach, still quietly staring at the fire. The firelight fills her eyes.'}
{3: "The white cat, on the other hand, is a whole lot friendlier. It stands up and jumps from Alpha's lap into yours. On your lap, it paws at your cross-body bag, making a rustling sound."}
{3: 'Silence slowly fills the air with no exchange of words between the two of you.'}
{3: 'The howling wind, the crackling of burning wood, the cooing of unknown birds in the dense forest... normally unnoticeable, these sounds have become unignorably clear now.'}
{3: "Though not something you experience on a daily basis, this silence isn't detestable."}
{3: 'With the crackling of new wood thrown into the fire, Alpha finally looks up with her usual gaze and expression.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Happy Birthday.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A straightforward, simple congratulations. No excitement, no acting. Just a plain, sincere wish.'}
{2: "Is that all you've got to say?", 3: '32', 4: 'Thank you.', 5: '33'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Don't push your luck.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'What else do you want?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Well, I could actually name a few if you wanted me to...', 3: '36', 4: 'Nah, I\'m happy with a simple "Happy Birthday."', 5: '36'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Was just hoping you could say it.'}
{2: "I'll have to think about it.", 3: '38'}
{2: 'In the meantime, how about some cake?', 3: '39'}
{3: 'Looking at Alpha, you quickly take out the small cake you brought with you from your cross-body bag and hand it to her.'}
{3: 'Alpha stares at the cake in your hands for a few seconds before taking it.'}
{3: 'She takes a scoop of the cake with the spoon and, instead of putting it into his mouth, just holds it in her hand and looks at it quietly.'}
{3: 'As you pass Alpha the cake, the cat paws at the package excitedly, its eyes shining brightly.'}
{3: 'Oh, this little fella... You let out a chuckle as you take out the cat biscuits you brought along with the cake and pour some onto your lap.'}
{3: 'The cat takes a curious sniff, gives it a lick, lowers its head, and starts munching away.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, Alpha finally puts the long-observed cake into her mouth.'}
{3: 'Woah... this is definitely a picture-worthy moment...'}
{3: 'However, after the first bite, Alpha stops and places the spoon on the cake without taking another bite.'}
{2: 'Not your kind of cake?', 3: '51'}
{2: "You're not going to tell me you're on a diet, are you...", 3: '53', 4: 'Well, then what is the...', 5: '53'}
{3: 'Before you even finish talking, Alpha has put the spoon with the cake still on it into her mouth.'}
{2: 'α', 3: "The cake's fine, tastes great...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'You can have the rest.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The cake ends up back in your hands, while Alpha stands at the cliff's edge, gazing at the distant horizon, her long hair and clothes fluttering in the wind."}
{3: 'A moment later, she turns around to look at you.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Let me know what your birthday wishes are.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "I'll make them happen.", 4: '1'}
